3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have height and thickness. Floors separate from walls. Interior volume is perceivable. Wall corner geometry is mostly correct, some minor issues in deck corners. Angled view is good, but perspective distortion is slightly noticeable at the back of the deck areas. Roof is removed, and interior spaces are fully visible, although the geometry of the external walls around the 'deck' areas feels a little 'choppy' rather than perfectly clean cuts.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room count and adjacency are correct. Relative room proportions are well preserved. Major wall positions align very well with the 2D plan, and wall lengths are proportional. Interior partitions are correctly placed. Doors and windows are present and on correct walls, and their sizes are proportionally accurate.

interior_elements.notes: Most major furniture (beds, sofas, tables) is present and kitchen/bathroom fixtures are included. Furniture is in appropriate rooms, and its scale is reasonable relative to the rooms. Orientation is logical. Text labels like '11'' X 12'' BED-2' persist in the 3D render, which although an E6-UI error, does not affect the furniture scoring directly, but hints at how elements were placed.

visual_clarity.notes: Walls, floors, and openings are clearly distinguishable. The geometry is readable. Interior is clearly visible with good lighting. However, the presence of the original 2D text labels (room names, dimensions) in the 3D render detracts from aesthetic coherence and presentation. The background is clean but contains a gray floor-like texture, which is not ideal.

detected_errors.description: Slight perspective distortion at the rear deck areas.
Some external wall geometry around deck areas appears slightly less clean/sharp.
Text labels from the 2D floor plan 'BED-1', 'LIVING / DINING', 'KITCHEN', 'FOYER', room dimensions etc. are present and legible in the 3D render, cluttering the view.

summary: The 2D floor plan has been transformed into a geometrically accurate 3D model with good fidelity, despite the presence of 2D text labels in the final render which slightly compromises visual clarity.
